formElement.label: Summary
formElement.description: One line short description of the requirement

formElement.label: Assigned to (multiple)

formElement.description: Who is in charge of satisfying the requirement

formElement.label: Author
formElement.description: User who originally submitted the requirement

formElement.label: Creation date
formElement.description: Date and time of the initial requirement submission

formElement.name: last_update_date
formElement.label: Last Modified On
formElement.description: Date and time of the latest modification in an artifact

formElement.name: cross_references
formElement.label: Cross references
formElement.description: List of items referenced by or referencing this item.

formElement.name: permissions_on_artifact
formElement.label: Permissions on artifact
formElement.description: Let users groups to define who can access an artifact.
